wikipedia_page.main: Phil Gladwin is a television writer and script editor. He created the screenwriting website and platform Screenwriting Goldmine, designed to help train young screenwriters and provide them with key resources relating to craft and business. He set it up, following frustrations with conventional screenwriting teaching and practices.

* Phil Gladwin, television writer and script editor

Production on the full series began in April 2007. Two of the five two-part stories were scripted by the special's co-writer Gareth Roberts.  Bad Girls and New Captain Scarlet writer Phil Ford wrote two stories and Phil Gladwin wrote one. Creator and executive producer Russell T Davies was going to write one story but was forced to drop out due to other work commitments.
